modules.title: Global Context and Early Encounters
modules.description: Explore global interconnections during early encounters.

subsections.title: Assignment 1
subsections.description: Write an analysis comparing Marco Polo’s and Ibn Battuta’s perspectives on trade networks in Asia and Africa.

subsections.title: Quiz 1
subsections.description: Quiz on early global interconnections and travel narratives

modules.title: Empires and the Atlantic World
modules.description: Study the expansion and conquest in the Atlantic World.

subsections.title: Assignment 2
subsections.description: Map the Columbian Exchange, identifying how food, diseases, and animals reshaped societies in Europe and the Americas.

subsections.title: Quiz 2
subsections.description: Quiz on the Portuguese expansion and the Columbian Exchange

modules.title: Slavery and Global Trade
modules.description: Examine the impact of the Atlantic Slave Trade on African and European societies.

subsections.title: Assignment 3
subsections.description: Analyze the economic and social impact of the Atlantic Slave Trade on African societies and European economies.

subsections.title: Quiz 3
subsections.description: Quiz on the Atlantic Slave Trade and global economic impact

modules.title: Revolutions and Enlightenment
modules.description: Explore intellectual and political revolutions of the 18th and 19th centuries.

subsections.title: Assignment 4
subsections.description: Write a comparative essay on how the ideas of Enlightenment and Marxism shaped 18th and 19th-century revolutions in Europe and Latin America.

subsections.title: Quiz 4
subsections.description: Quiz on Enlightenment and Marxist ideologies and their impacts

modules.title: Imperialism and Nationalism
modules.description: Analyze New Imperialism and the rise of national identities.

subsections.title: Assignment 5
subsections.description: Group project on the resistance to European imperialism in Asia and Africa, focusing on leaders like Lin Zexu and Morel.

subsections.title: Quiz 5
subsections.description: Quiz on European imperialism and national movements

modules.title: World Wars and Decolonization
modules.description: Examine the conflicts of the 20th century and the process of decolonization.

subsections.title: Assignment 6
subsections.description: Research paper on how World War I triggered revolutions and shaped modern national identities in Europe and the Middle East.

subsections.title: Quiz 6
subsections.description: Quiz on World War I, revolutions, and decolonization movements

modules.title: The Cold War and Post-Colonial World
modules.description: Study the Cold War and post-colonial dynamics in Africa and Asia.

subsections.title: Assignment 7
subsections.description: Final paper on the role of the Cold War in shaping the decolonization movements in Africa and Asia.

subsections.title: Quiz 7
subsections.description: Quiz on Cold War dynamics and post-colonialism
